topic.title: developing
topic.body:
Hi all!
I'm an italian developer and I'm so intrested of this network. Do you know if exist a site (into ZeroNet) for developers? I'm interested in understanding more about this network work.

1_1DpjGe8YZWP3idvaNTbBbHzuda341g4W2k.body:
> [lukipuki](#comment_42_1CMYxdit4qq9QGk9DYRu2ruRPd2YDGckH8): follow this sub_topic here: http://127.0.0.1:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topics:3_1PVcdu7USZH2kHMETbqDYLPjJZKCDWM52k/Zite+development

Oh, thanks :)
